name: Desert (Inirdin)
description:
2018-11-10

As part of learning Unity at school, we got finished player controller and we had to make basic shooter with it. I went bit overboard with environment. Light of the sun is controlled by volume of high frequencies in the music.

Destroy all 3 red towers. If you get hit you lose one gun, replenish guns with green pickups. Zero guns, actuall fun. Don't use inventory. Open the gate. Find all 4 dogs. Find a bike, ride it, hate it, restart the game because you can't get off of it. Delete this. End it.

The Awful controls:
WASD - Terrible buggy movement
Space - No jump
Mouse - Look around
Left Click - Bring suffering
Right Click - Touch
Left Shift - Slow down the bike
Esc - Give up
Alt+F4 - Give up faster

Music and sfx:
Swans - Frankie M.
Swans - Coward (live)
Chocobo Racing - Winner's Jig (remix)
Sfx: Jazz Jackrabbit 2
